botMessages.message: I notice that we have a pending call, give a second and let me transfer with an agent.
Welcome to support via WhatsApp
Welcome to support via Embedded Messaging
Welcome to support via Facebook
What language would you prefer to the bot in ?
Language set to {!Language}
Hi, I'm ASKR Technologies Virtual Assistant.
Please tell me how I can help you today
Choose one of those possible utterances
Choose an option

botQuickReplyOptions.literalValue: Inquire about our Products and Services

botMessages.message: Ok, got it, you would like to make a warranty claim.
Before we proceed, can I ask you several questions to verify your customer information?
I will need to know your First Name, Last Name, Email Address and Customer Number. Can you please enter it?

botDialogs.description: Bot ask to the user information to claim a warranty
botDialogs.label: Customer Information

botMessages.message: Hi {!FirstName} {!LastName}

botDialogs.description: Dialog to show the process to the warranty
botDialogs.label: Start Proccess Warranty Standard

botMessages.message: Hi {!FirstName} {!LastName} let me transfer you to an VIP agent

botDialogs.description: Dialog to show the process to the warranty
botDialogs.label: Start Proccess Warranty VIP

botMessages.message: {!FirstName}, for which of these products would you like to make a warranty claim?
Can you give a title for your problem with {!Asset_Object.Name}?
Ok, thank you, can you describe what problem you are having with {!Asset_Object.Name}?
Maybe some of those articles can help you?
Summary
{!Knowledge_Object.Summary}
Solution
{!Knowledge_Object.Solution__c}
{!FirstName}, do your problem is solved ?
I am sorry to hear about your challenges, let me transfer you to an agent
Thanks for taking the time to chat. I’ve ended the conversation. To start a new conversation, enter some text.
Sorry, I didn't understand that.
Unfortunately, there are no agents available at the moment
Unfortunately, a system error occurred. Let us start again.
Unfortunately, your information does not exist into the ASKR Technologies.

botDialogs.description: If the data from the user does not exists into the database, finished the call
botDialogs.label: Contact Not Exists

botMessages.message: Unfortunately, you do not have any asset into the ASKR Technologies.
